articles.author: Myles Simmons
articles.title: Philip Rivers signing with Colts practice squad - NBC Sports
articles.description: Rivers, who turned 44 on Monday, is back with Indianapolis after the club has suffered several injuries at QB.
articles.content:
Hes actually doing it. 
After retiring following the 2020 season, 44-year-old Philip Rivers is signing with the Colts practice squad after working out with the club on Monday night, according to mul… [+1302 chars]

articles.author: Georg Szalai
articles.title: BAFTA Games Awards 2026 Longlists Unveiled - The Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The BAFTA Games Awards ceremony will take place in London on April 17, with the longlists containing the likes of 'Indiana Jones and the Great Circle,' 'F1 25' and 'Jurassic World Evolution 3.'
articles.content: The nominations longlists for the 2025 BAFTA Games Awards were unveiled in London on Tuesday, with a total of 64 games selected across 17 categories by more than 1,700 BAFTA members. Founded in 2004,… [+5879 chars]
